lines.name: HERMIT
lines.dialog: This one thinks herself a prodigy?

lines.name: HERMIT
lines.dialog: This one is already missing a pillar.

lines.name: HERMIT
lines.dialog: Your sorcery is gaudy and redundant.

lines.name: HERMIT
lines.dialog: You would split into four what is truly two. Does and does not.

lines.name: HERMIT
lines.dialog: For each pillar that falls, so too will the others crumble under the weight.
